options.fig-cap: Plot of the residuals against the fitted values for two hypothetical models.  One illustrated what we would expect under a correctly specified mean model; the second is an example of a graphic indicating the mean model is misspecified.
options.fig-alt: Side by side scatter plots of residuals; the second graphic shows a trend in the location across the fitted values.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-7

options.fig-cap: Example of a posterior predictive check comparing the observed distribution of the response against those predicted based on the posterior distribution.
options.fig-alt: Several density plots overlaid with one highlighted for comparison.
